channel.title: Help with Cache

item.title: Help with Cache
item.dc:creator: @makla makla
item.description:
@makla wrote:

Will edit for my next error

So I use soulsplit client and I made it download my cache, it already had an auto downloader but whenever it downloads it doesn’t unpack successfully just sits there and says error connecting retrying etc etc

If I would want to take out the auto cache download feature… or make it to not dl the cache and have it just come with the downloadable client

This is my signlink… I thought of making it from

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"C:/"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "SoulSplit1"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { String s1 = as[i]; if(s1.length() > 0) { File file = new File(s1); if(!file.exists()) continue; }

to

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"./"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "SoulSplit1"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { String s1 = as[i]; if(s1.length() > 0) { File file = new File(s1); if(!file.exists()) continue; }

Can anybody help me out please?

Read full topic
